ï½€# File Summarizer Skill

## What this skill does
Reads any file and creates a simple summary.

## How to use in Claude Code

Just say:
```
Summarize this file using the file-summarizer skill
```

Or:
```
Use file-summarizer on README.md
```

## What it actually does
1. Reads the file
2. Counts lines, words, characters
3. Shows first few lines
4. Shows file type

That's it! Super simple to understand.
